        unbind

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        <F> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration bind(String id,
                                           HasValue<F> widget,
                                           Strategy strategy)
        Bind a widget to a property id. Every time an event related to the selected strategy occurs, the updated value is sent to the uiHandlers (Presenter)
        Type Parameters:
        F - value type
        Parameters:
        id - identification of property
        widget - widget to bind
        strategy - strategy of value update
        Returns:
        HandlerRegistration of this binding

      • bind

        <F> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration bind(String id,
                                           TakesValue<F> widget)
        Bind a widget with default strategy (NONE). This binding will behavior like a read-only widget.
        Type Parameters:
        F - value type
        Parameters:
        id - identification of property
        widget - widget to bind
        Returns:
        HandlerRegistration of this binding
